thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Robyn

author: Robyn
title: Robyn
text: Andrew our sales person was fantastic, helpful, efficient, really helped us decide what we wanted and made the process very easy. I was disappointed with how we had to chase up for the finance side, we had to call not them calling us. But once we got through that, the collection of car was smooth and easy. Would buy again from the dealership and we are planning to do so later in the year.
